topic.title: zeronet behind apache proxy
topic.body:
Hello, anyone succeeded to set up apache rules (2.4) to get working?
as used to be, http://127.0.0.1:43110/ is the zeronet, and I'd like to be exposed as https://example.com/ZeroNet/

so this site http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/ would be
https://example.com/ZeroNet/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/

I'm trying ProxyPass (wstunnel as well), CookieDomains, but no luck. Has anyone a working config already? Thanks

1_1PXXUwyKemsXQ4P8o5ErFwsm8GbgNzcmXB.body: No issue with the TLS, it's LetsEncrypt on the example.com. And I don't think there would be an issue on zeronet side, because its not https.

1534361696_1PXXUwyKemsXQ4P8o5ErFwsm8GbgN.body: Szerintetek mikor tiltják majd a szabad internetet?
